arStrings.szText:
You deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemies.

After making an enemy {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c}, your next Direct damage dealt to them:
{icon:bullet,1.2} Heals you for {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([Max(1,PlayerHealthMax() * {SF_1})]){/c}
{icon:bullet,1.2} Generates {c_number}[{SF_2}]{/c} Vigor
{icon:bullet,1.2} Removes the {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} effect
